features: 48-HOUR PROTECTION: Active lives need Degree Men Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant. This antiperspirant for men delivers confidence with 48-hour sweat and odor protection
FEEL SHOWER-FRESH ALL DAY: This antiperspirant deodorant keeps you feeling dry with an invigorating, citrus scent. You'll feel as fresh as when you started your day
READY FOR WHAT’S NEXT: Take on the day with Degree Men Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant stick. Simply twist, glide, and move

body.description: Degree Men Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant delivers 48-hour sweat and odor protection to keep you feeling dry and fresh. This antiperspirant deodorant for men works as hard as you do and offers 48-hour protection, so you can take on the day. Our Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant features a refreshing kick of crisp, citrus freshness. The powerful antiperspirant deodorant responds when you need it most, so you can stay confident without having to worry about slowing down. You can be confident you’ll be protected from sweat and odor by this antiperspirant for men. Stay fresh and feel clean from morning to night. Simply twist, glide and get moving. The crisp, energizing scent helps to keep you as fresh as when you started your day. Stay dry, cool, and confident thanks to Degree Men Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant. At Degree, we want to inspire the confidence in everyone to move more and go further. We’re here to support your journey through an antiperspirant that moves with you and helps you go beyond your limits. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging. Degree. It won’t let you down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Degree Men Extreme Blast helps keep you fresh and dry, no matter what. A men’s antiperspirant that offers 48-hour sweat and odor protection with an energizing burst of apple and fresh mint.

48-HOUR SWEAT & ODOR PROTECTION This antiperspirant deodorant delivers unstoppable sweat and odor protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. ALL-DAY FRESHNESS Whatever the day may bring, this antiperspirant deodorant keeps you dry and protected. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD SUSTAINABILITY At Degree, we're committed to creating the most sustainable and inclusive products possible. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging.

Degree Men Advanced Adventure Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.7 oz Degree Men Advanced Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.7 oz, Twin Pack Degree Men Advanced Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant, 2.7 oz Main Benefit Degree Men Advanced Adventure Antiperspirant Deodorant provides up to 72 hours of protection against sweat and body odor. Degree Men Advanced Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant features a zesty citrus and a kick of mint to keep you fresher with every move. Degree Men Advanced Clean Antiperspirant Deodorant with long-lasting MotionSense Technology provides superior motion-activated protection to give you powerful sweat and odor protection with a fresh fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Freshness Fiesta in a Pack of 6
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR: Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant Cool Rush Stick: A fresh, enduring champion in the deodorant world, bulk value galore.Embark on a fragrance odyssey with the Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant Cool Rush Stick, Pack of 6. It's like the bodyguard of freshness, sticking with you through thick and thin. This isn't just a deodorant; it's a full-day commitment to smelling like a breath of cool, fresh air.The 48-hour odor protection is no fairy tale – it's a trusty sidekick that won't let you down. The Cool Rush scent? Think of it as that invigorating splash of cool water on a hot day, but for your pits. Whether you're nailing a presentation or crushing it at the gym, this deodorant has your back, keeping you suave and smell-free.Application is a smooth, glide-on affair – no tugging, no stickiness. It's like your pits are getting VIP treatment. Quick to dry and kind to clothes, it leaves no trace of white marks or betrayal.Let's talk economics – the Pack of 6 is like striking oil in your backyard. It's a gold mine of value, ensuring you're stocked up and ready for whatever life throws your way. Each stick is like a marathon runner, going the distance and then some.Gentle on the skin, tough on odor – it's the deodorant equivalent of a velvet hammer. Even after regular use, your skin feels pampered, not punished. And the stick's durability? It's ready for any adventure, be it a gym session or a world tour.The Cool Rush scent masters the art of subtlety. It doesn't scream for attention; it earns it, blending effortlessly with any cologne or aftershave you choose. It's equally at home in a boardroom or at a backyard BBQ.In conclusion, if you're hunting for a deodorant that's a true all-rounder – long-lasting, pleasantly scented, and kind to your wallet – the Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant Cool Rush Stick, Pack of 6, is your ticket to an odor-free nirvana. Say hello to a world where freshness is a constant companion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stay Fresh All Day with Degree Men Cool Rush Deodorant Stick - A Bulk Deal Worth Every Penny
reviews.reviewText: If you're in search of a reliable deodorant that keeps you feeling and smelling fresh throughout the day, look no further than the Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant Cool Rush Stick. I recently ordered the Pack of 6, and I must say, it's been a game-changer in my daily grooming routine.First and foremost, the 48-hour odor protection claim isn't just a marketing gimmick – it's the real deal. The Cool Rush scent is both invigorating and subtle, providing a refreshing burst that lasts all day long. From busy workdays to intense workouts, this deodorant has kept me feeling confident and odor-free, no matter the situation.The convenient stick format makes application a breeze. It glides on smoothly without any sticky residue, ensuring you stay dry without that uncomfortable, clumpy feeling. The deodorant dries quickly, so you can get dressed immediately after application without worrying about staining your clothes.What truly impressed me about this pack is its value for money. With six deodorant sticks in one order, you're not only saving time and effort on frequent reordering, but you're also getting a bulk deal that's incredibly cost-effective. Each stick contains a generous 2.7 oz of product, and a little goes a long way, meaning this pack will keep you covered for months.Degree Men's reputation for quality holds true with this product. The formula is gentle on the skin, even after regular use, and I haven't experienced any irritation or discomfort. The stick is also designed to withstand the demands of an active lifestyle – it won't crumble or break, making it ideal for tossing into a gym bag or travel kit.The Cool Rush scent strikes a perfect balance between a classic, masculine fragrance and a modern, clean aroma. It's not overpowering, making it suitable for both casual and formal settings. Plus, the scent doesn't clash with any colognes or aftershaves you might choose to wear.In summary, the Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant Cool Rush Stick in the Pack of 6 is a fantastic deal that offers long-lasting freshness, reliable odor protection, and exceptional value. If you're tired of reapplying deodorant throughout the day or worrying about unpleasant body odors, this pack is a must-have addition to your grooming routine. Get ready to experience cool confidence that lasts – even through the busiest of days. Highly recommended!
